trans-unit.source: Specifies processing rules or option settings for a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader" /> 的處理規則或選項設定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether writers that use the associated <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader" /> for context should use designer settings for writing content explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值決定針對內容 (Context) 使用相關聯 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader" /> 的寫入器，是否應該明確使用設計工具設定來寫入內容 (Content)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify that writers that use this context should use designer settings for writing any output content in cases where <see cref="P:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsWritePublic" /> reports <see langword="false" />; <see langword="false" /> if designer settings should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示在 <see cref="P:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsWritePublic" /> 報告 <see langword="false" /> 的情況下，使用此內容的寫入器應該使用設計工具設定來寫入任何輸出。如果應該忽略設計工具設定，則為 <see langword="false" />。
這項設定會在內部查詢。

trans-unit.source: It influences the following behavior for the context that a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader> passes to any <xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter>:
trans-unit.target: 它會影響下列內容的行為，<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>傳遞到任何<xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter>:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings.RequireExplicitContentVisibility%2A> behavior only applies for properties where <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsWritePublic%2A> is `false`, AND when a `ShouldSerialize` pattern is unavailable for the property value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings.RequireExplicitContentVisibility%2A>行為僅適用於內容位置<xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsWritePublic%2A>是`false`，和當`ShouldSerialize`模式不適用於屬性值。

trans-unit.source: If the statement in the first bullet point is true, AND <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings.RequireExplicitContentVisibility%2A> is `true`, then designer settings determine whether the property writes its output as content or the property is considered implicit.
trans-unit.target: 如果陳述式中的第一個項目符號點為 true，AND<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings.RequireExplicitContentVisibility%2A>是`true`，則設計工具的設定會判斷是否將屬性寫入其輸出視為內容或屬性會被視為隱含。

trans-unit.source: Access to designer settings is through internal APIs in .NET Framework XAML Services and is based on reading <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute> from backing assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具設定的存取權是透過.NET Framework XAML 服務中的內部應用程式開發介面，並且根據讀取<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute>從備份組件。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the internal code checks for the value <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content?displayProperty=nameWithType> and writes its output to the property.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，內部的程式碼會檢查值<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content?displayProperty=nameWithType>並將其輸出寫入屬性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the content is considered implicit.
trans-unit.target: 否則，會將內容視為隱含。

trans-unit.source: If the statement in the first bullet is `true`, AND <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings.RequireExplicitContentVisibility%2A> is `false`, the property always writes its output, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute> from backing assemblies is irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一個項目符號中的陳述式`true`，AND<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings.RequireExplicitContentVisibility%2A>是`false`，此屬性一律會寫入的輸出，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute>從備份組件無關。
